data.name: REGAL CINEMAS
data.description: Featuring blockbuster movies and luxury recliner seating, Regal MGM Springfield is the ultimate entertainment destination for movie fans. This cinematic paradise features seven cutting-edge auditoriums and a full bar, inviting guests to kick back and relax with their favorite feature films.

data.name: ESSENTIALS
data.description: Carrying all of your everyday needs including resort logos and fashion apparel for men and women, logo souvenirs, sundries, snacks, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Essentials has all the little necessary items to keep your time here going smoothly.

data.name: TOPGOLF SWING SUITE
data.description: This outlet is currently open and taking reservations for groups only. Gather your friends and discover the most advanced way to play golf year-round at MGM Springfield. Looking for your next party idea or a place to better enhance your golfing skills? Topgolf Swing Suite is a fun experience for all ages that offers a comfy lounge to hangout while you enjoy fantastic food and drinks.
